<MethodEndpoint

>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



UpdateParams defines a (governance) operation for updating the module
parameters. The authority defaults to the x/gov module account.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type.\n\n- Used for updating the migration module parameters via governance\n- All parameters must be supplied\n\nNext free index: 3","type":"object","properties":{"authority":{"description":"authority is the address that controls the module (defaults to x/gov unless overwritten).","type":"string"},"params":{"title":"Module parameters to update\nNOTE: All parameters must be supplied","description":"Params defines the parameters for the module.\n\nNext free index: 3","type":"object","properties":{"allow_morse_account_import_overwrite":{"description":"allow_morse_account_import_overwrite is a feature flag which is used to enable/disable\nthe re-importing of Morse claimable accounts by the authority.\nSuch a re-import will:\n- Ignore (i.e. leave) ALL claimed destination Shannon accounts/actors\n- Delete ALL existing onchain MorseClaimableAccounts\n- Import the new set of MorseClaimableAccounts from the provided MsgImportMorseClaimableAccounts\nThis is useful for testing purposes, but should be disabled in production.","type":"boolean"},"waive_morse_claim_gas_fees":{"type":"boolean","title":"waive_morse_claim_gas_fees is a feature flag used to enable/disable the waiving of gas fees for txs that:\n- Contain exactly one secp256k1 signer\n- Contain at least one Morse account/actor claim messages\n- Do not contain any other messages other than Morse account/actor claim messages"}}}}}}},"description":"MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type.\n\n- Used for updating the migration module parameters via governance\n- All parameters must be supplied\n\nNext free index: 3","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

>
  
</StatusCodes>
